thread.title: Chain Of Music Entertainment LLC – Welcomes No Q Tommy No Question’s Lead Singer, And Radio Personality Of Pqradio1.Com To The Chain Roaster
thread.title_full: Chain Of Music Entertainment LLC – Welcomes No Q Tommy No Question’s Lead Singer, And Radio Personality Of Pqradio1.Com To The Chain Roaster

author: prbuzz.com
title: Chain Of Music Entertainment LLC – Welcomes No Q Tommy No Question’s Lead Singer, And Radio Personality Of Pqradio1.Com To The Chain Roaster
text:
NoQ Tommy (Thomas Blackwell VI) is bursting with talent his amazing range enables him to master music from Pop to R&B. The Chain Of Music Entertainment LLC. Commits to taking NoQ Tommy Career to new levels with our full Management Team.
As history has it on No Question’s conception, Kenny Gamble and Leon Huff saw the promise in No Question group and decidedly brought them to the forefront with a debut CD. That debut entitled No Question on Philadelphia International Records, which eventually spawned the hit "I Don't Care" and a remake of "You Make Me Feel Brand New." Though solid, the group switched labels, teaming with Chris Schwartz to become Ruff/Nation Records' first R&B group. There is though, no question on No Q Tommy’s abundance of talent, promise and potential.
Philly vocal quartet No Question pop R&B group features Damon Core Dante Massey, Thomas Blackwell, and Nicholas Johnson. And they present a buffet spread of vocal styles that titillate anyone who likes a good pop R&B showdown complete with killer dance moves.
No Q Tommy’s vocal style range from a raw like Al Green to a soulful extension of Boyz II Men. No Q Tommy’s amazing talent is one that The Chain Of Music Entertainment LLC took note of then acknowledged. It is The Chain of Music Entertainment LLC’s absolute privilege to manage someone who is splendidly a bona fide pop R&B crooner who can interchange to R&B soul – the versatility is impressive.
As for No Q Tommy a.k.a. Thomas Blackwell, his singing and music syncing ability begs special mention from the No Question group. He transcended smoothly, from past to present while keeping his trademark style intact. That is something many artists find hard to take on and fizzle out in the process. One can notice that No Q Tommy’s groove is still intact from the “I Don’t Care” No Question group single to “Gemini.” How he bridged the vocals and diversified them is nothing short of wondrous. No Q Tommy’s R&B music acumen is stellar which inveigle R&B songs covets. No Q Tommy aka Tommy Blackwell’s across the board nature of singing and syncing will take his career as an entertainer into long pathways which he will rock like a boss.
You can find more information about No Q Tommy at www.chainofmusic.com or www.NoQtommy.com
It can be deduced without question that No Q Tommy’s affiliation with The Chain Of Music Entertainment LLC will make more R&B inroads and entertain the masses!
For more information, contact: Marion E. Smith, 1-800-913-0231 Ext 24, This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it. , http://www.chainofmusic.com/event/
